channel.title: Need Testers - 2006 Remake
channel.description:
[center][b]Noob Days: Another Remake[/b][/center] Yes, I know that there are about 30 remakes available at the moment. As for mine, I need testers to try and login to the server. (I was having connection problems.) It's a Hamachi server as it's not released for Alpha yet. This thread will be closed as soon as I get someone to test it.
Players who test will receive: Rare of his/her choice (So not just admins have rares) PMod status when server is released Permanent server access.
Hamachi Server Name: Noob Days Password: 123 IP: 5.57.26.15
ALSO: Need developers! Good with Java! Reply if your interested, thank you.

item.title: Need Testers - 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

ro8bi3:

Is there any way to change login info WITHOUT resetting the whole router? Cause I got no idea how to.

Of course there is.
Ask your step-dad. If he doesn’t give it to you, reset your router. Make sure you have any installation CDs or whatever that’s needed for it to set up.
To reset your router, locate your huge ass box that you can’t really miss. Then, look on the back. There should be a little button that says ‘RESET’. Push it with a pencil/pen tip, hold it there for 30 seconds. Let go. It should blink or something to let you know it has been reset. If it doesn’t, unplug it or something… Then, put in your installation disc or whatever you have, and reinstall your router. When that’s done, open cmd.exe, type IPCONFIG, then get the IPv4 Address and type it into your address bar… The username should be ‘Admin’ and the pass should be ‘admin’, or the user could be ‘Administrator’ and the pass could be ‘admin’. If it’s not, search the default password for your router on google.
Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Testers - 2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

ro8bi3:

I can’t, my stepdad changed our routers login info. Maybe you could host on your computer? I could buy a domain for you if you want, but thats about it.

Can’t host on my computer. Port 43594 is being used, port 43593 is being used, port 43595 is being used, and port 5555 is being used.
Reset your router - but make sure you know how to set it up again.
